repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
The manuscript is of Devīmāhātmya. This is part of Mārkaṇḍeyapurāṇa. The manuscript is very hazy. The shelfmark stickers are glued on the last folio so it is difficult to read middle part of the folio.
The end of the mansucript does not match with the published texts of the Devīmāhātmya.
The colophon of the manuscript is not clear it seems that the first letter represents year but the code form is used hence it is difficult to know the exact year. It was written by the Rāmasvami.

msItem.title: Devīmāhātmya

filiation.p: Aufrecht Catalogus vol.1- p 176 entry as Caṇḍimahātmya. New Catalogus Catalogorum vol.6- 299-302 Durgāmahātmya vol. 9- p. 83

msItem.rubric: [1v 1] śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃcaturbhujaṃ prasannavadanaṃ dhyā [1v 2] yet sarvavighnopaśāntaye .
msItem.explicit: [119r 7] mahābhayāoaharaṇam śatrughni? ya karantathā a?…..ti ??? vināśanaṃ anantasvargaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca [119r 8] ma?? ṃantram na saṃśayaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: [119r 8] śrigurubhyo na? śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ devīmahātmyaṃ samāptaṃ devīmahātmyaṃ samāptaṃ

extent.measure: guard folio missing. no blank folio. 119 wriiten folio

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numers in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: Corners are damaged and broken. Text is faint.

handNote.desc: Hazy writing. Could be wriiten by two scribes as the beggining folio has clean and separated characters and the end has hazy writing style.

additions.desc: Number III and 13 are wriiten in the left margin of the first folio.

listBibl.bibl: Durgāsaptaśati Bhāṣānuvādasahita, Chandika Prasad Awasthi: Collection of Late Manmohan Shastri Jyotishi, eGangotri-35.

encodingDesc.p: ? is used to show doubful reading and dot is unsed to show lacuna. [] is used to show inferred reading.

TEI.text:
[1v 1] śuklāṃbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃcaturbhujaṃ prasannavadanaṃ dhyā [1v 2] yet sarvavighnopaśāntaye . [1v 2] asya devīmahātmyastotra [1v 3]mahāmantrasya mārkaṇḍeyamedhubrahmādayarṣayaḥ [1v 4] anuṣṭubhtriṣṭubjagatipaṃktyādayaśchaṃdāṃsi madhukai [1v 5] ṭabhamadādinimahiṣāsuramarddanidhumralocanacaṇḍamuṇḍa?ra [2r 1] ktabījasuṃbhanisuṃbhamarddānyo devatā śrīmahakā?lī mahā[la]
[119r 7] mahābhayāoaharaṇam śatrughni? ya karantathā a?…..ti ??? vināśanaṃ anantasvargaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca [119r 8] ma?? ṃantram na saṃśayaḥ [119r 8] śrigurubhyo na? śrīgaṇeśāya namaḥ devīmahātmyaṃ samāptaṃ devīmahātmyaṃ samāptaṃ [119r 8] ku? paiṅkuṉi 13 rāmasvāmi likhitam
